憣字的基本解释

憣
fān
迅速改变：“为谁书到便憣然，至今此意无人晓。”
古通“翻”（a.事物有截然相反的变动；b.越过）。

憣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fān］
［《正字通》符山切］
(1)心动。参见“憣然”。
(2)通“翻”。变易。参见“憣校”、“憣然”。
(3)通“翻”。反而。

憣字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页403第17
【正字通】符山切，音番。心變動也。

憣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
憣字的起名意思

暂无。

Stupefied
Basic explanation of words
Stupefied
fān
Quickly change: "Who is the one who has written it for me, so far no one knows what I mean."
Gu Tong "turns over" (a. Things have diametrically opposite changes; b. Goes over).
Stupefied
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fān］
["Zhengzitong" Fushan cut]
(1) Heartbeat. See "Shan Ran".
(2) Through "turning". Change. See "Han School", "Han Ran".
(3) Through "turning". instead.
Stupefied
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憣; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 403 Page 17
【Zhengzitong】Fushan cut, Yinfan. Heart changes also.
